sentences.en: A bayonet blade is forged from the finest steel.
sentences.cn: 刺刀刃是用最优质的钢锻造的.

sentences.en: A bayonet had been thrust through his belly.
sentences.cn: 一把刺刀刺穿了他的肚子.

sentences.en: A soldier plunged a bayonet into his body.
sentences.cn: 一名士兵将刺刀插进了他的身体。

sentences.en: After a fierce bayonet charge, we drove back the enemy.
sentences.cn: 经过一场激烈的白刃战, 我们打退了敌人.

sentences.en: Fascinated by this magic light-generating globe, he cut it off with his bayonet and put it in his knapsack so he could carry around the light with him wherever he went.
sentences.cn: 他对这个会发光的小球很痴迷，于是用刺刀把它割了下来，放进自己的背包，他觉得这样他就可以把光带到任何他想去的地方了。

sentences.en: He fixed a bayonet to the end of his rifle.
sentences.cn: 他在步枪口上安好了刺刀。

sentences.en: His rifle with the bayonet fixed was leaning against the wall.
sentences.cn: 他的上了刺刀的步枪斜靠在墙上.

sentences.en: I would never bare a bayonet on the anniversary of his death.
sentences.cn: 在他逝世的忌日里,我决不拔出刺刀.

sentences.en: One of the guys walked over to Hooker, rammed him through with a bayonet and left.
sentences.cn: 其中一个人跨过胡克的身体，用刺刀撞了他一下，然后离开了。

sentences.en: She was stabbed with a bayonet by the enemy.
The fascist soldier thrust his bayonet into the man's body.
sentences.cn: 那个法西斯士兵把刺刀刺入那人的身体.

sentences.en: The invader thrust the blade of his bayonet into the woman's heart.
sentences.cn: 侵略兵把刺刀的刀身刺入那个妇人的心脏.

sentences.en: The sergeant thundered, " Let me see that bayonet. "
sentences.cn: 中士怒喝道: “ 让我看看那把刺刀. ”

sentences.en: The soldiers had drills in the use of the bayonet.
The soldiers were ordered by their inhuman officers to bayonet every man they could find.
sentences.cn: 毫无人性的军官们命令士兵见人就刺。

sentences.en: We taught soldiers to bayonet and to survive hand - to - hand combat.
sentences.cn: 我们教给士兵如何使用刺刀和怎样在短兵相接的战斗中生存下来.

trans.tran_en: a long knife that is fixed to the end of a  rifle (=  long gun  )
to push the point of a bayonet into someone

trans.tran_cn: 用刺刀刺，刺杀，用武力迫使
